column3: str

<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
Learningway is worried one of his fellow Loporrits has met with misfortune.
Investigate the water reserve in Greatest Endsvale.
Fill the empty bottle with allegedly purifying water.
Pour the allegedly purifying water on the shaky Loporrit.
Report to Learningway.
If you're not too busy, might I trouble you to look into something for me?
I recently heard word that one of our fellows is acting strangely near one of the water reserves in Greatest Endsvale.
Everyone knows that water is for our passengers-to-be, and if anything should happen to those reserves, it could ruin everything!
I doubt they would talk to me, but I suspect they might be willing to confess their plans if you asked them. You'll help, won't you?
The reserve you're looking for is on the northern end of Greatest Endsvale. Please hurry before they do anything foolish.
I can't imagine what they would want with that water, but we can't risk anything happening to that reserve.
Wah! Who are you? What's the matter?
Suspicious? Me? But why? I haven't done anything wrong.
Urianger was teaching me about telling fortunes, and I've been trying to practice so I could show the others how it's done.

In fact, I even made my own carrot cards, though they're not quite as fancy as Urianger's. I tried using them to see what good fortune will come to the people of Etheirys when they visit the moon, but...
Maybe I did it wrong, but the cards had nothing good to say. I got the complete opposite. So I thought I'd try again after purifying myself in the water here.
That is what your people do, yes? I read that it's possible to purify oneself using water, but I don't feel as if anything has changed. Maybe I've missed a step somewhere...
Oh! Could you draw the water for me? Coming from Hydaelyn's chosen, I'm sure it'd be the most purifyingest water ever!
All you have to do is fill this empty bottle with water and pour it on me. Please─the outcome of my carrot card reading is in your hands!
I know good fortune is in the cards for the people of Etheirys. I just need a little help proving it.
Ah, how refreshing. I feel like a brand-new Loporrit!
Already I can feel my spirit overflowing with good fortune. Time to have another look at those carrot cards, and see what awaits the people of Etheirys.
Well? Did you find out what that good-for-nothing was up to?
Oh! Really? Well, that's...actually quite admirable, making such efforts to understand the culture of Etheirys.
That said, I'm not sure one is meant to redraw cards until they find a desired result. Or perhaps I misheard how fortune telling is meant to work...
...Maybe I should go and talk to them about that.
Then again, there's been no harm done, and they mean well. Perhaps I'll discuss the finer points of card reading with them another day. Thank you for looking into this!
